name: International Compliance Association
description: The International Compliance Association (ICA) is the leading professional body for the global regulatory and financial crime compliance community. Since 2001, we have enhanced the knowledge, skills and behaviour of over 160,000 professionals all over the world either through our internationally-recognised portfolio of professional qualifications (awarded in association with Alliance Manchester Business School, the University of Manchester) or through accredited in-company training.

enhanced_description: The International Compliance Association (ICA) is the leading professional body established in 2001, dedicated to empowering the global regulatory and financial crime compliance community. ICA offers internationally-recognized professional qualifications, awarded in association with Alliance Manchester Business School, the University of Manchester, and provides accredited in-company training. Its comprehensive offerings in anti-money laundering (AML), financial crime prevention, governance, and risk are designed to enhance the knowledge, skills, and behavior of professionals, with over 160,000 individuals trained worldwide. The ICA's programs aim to accelerate skill development, improve learning efficiency, and enable organizations to strengthen their risk management approaches and gain a competitive advantage.
